pages.text: 3 months After Zheng's death, Kappas visited me asking about him.$(br2)They felt shocked and pity for his death.$(br2)They showed me the strange Blade. It was a katana without blade.

They said the Blade stood for the highest technology level, for it was the full form of TLS system.$(br2)When it was switched on, red laser formed its blade.$(br2)They wanted Zheng to help them with its appearance and some other works, but now Zheng was...
I named it Thousand. Maybe it should be named so.$(br2)Midoritake
